alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 3:58AM AKST until February 07 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. In addition, areas of poor visibility are expected. Storm total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches expected. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range south of Black Rapids. * WHEN...Until 9 PM Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will fall through Monday evening. Storm total snowfall of 6 to 8 inches is expected south of Black Rapids. North of Black Rapids snow amounts are expected to be 2 to 4 inches. Snow is expected to taper off late Monday night. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
